mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT mi.MOVIE_TITLE,g.GENRE_ID,mi.RELEASE_DATE,mi.RUNTIME,mi.MOVIE_ID,mi.POSTER_URL FROM MOVIE_GENRE mg, MOVIE_INFO mi, GENRE g WHERE mi.MOVIE_ID = mg.MOVIE_ID AND mg.GENRE_ID = g.GENRE_ID ORDER BY genre_id

SELECT DISTINCT mi.MOVIE_TITLE,g.GENRE_ID,mi.RELEASE_DATE,mi.RUNTIME,mi.MOVIE_ID,mi.POSTER_URL FROM MOVIE_GENRE mg, MOVIE_INFO mi, GENRE g WHERE mi.MOVIE_ID = mg.MOVIE_ID AND mg.GENRE_ID = g.GENRE_ID AND g.GENRE_ID = #{genre_id} ORDER BY GENRE_ID DESC
